abstract: NHL Roundup; Pittsburgh Penguins defeat New Jersey Devils, 4-1; Penguins center Jordan Staal reaches 100-goal career milestone; other hockey results and news noted.
snippet: Jordan Staal’s two goals led Pittsburgh past New Jersey, 4-1. Edmonton shut out the Rangers, 2-0.
lead_paragraph: Jordan Staal’s two goals led Pittsburgh past New Jersey, 4-1. Edmonton shut out the Rangers, 2-0.

headline.main: Staal Scores Twice as Penguins Defeat Devils
headline.print_headline: Staal Scores Twice as Penguins Defeat Devils; Rangers Lose on a Shutout in Edmonton
headline.seo: Penguins Hold Off Devils; Rangers Lose to Oilers
